title: (x) "natura" logo - custom designed {Stephen}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203231412im_/http:/typophile.com/files/natura_logo_6650.jpg)

looks like percolator.

have searched my FontBook for an hour now :(
author: jayyy

comments.content: Logos are often customized specifically for that brand. This is likely not a font.

thanks for all your help.

it is definitely a custom font that appears to be based on fusion.
Another alternative could be [Amerika Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203231412/http:/www.dafont.com/amerika-sans.font?text=natura) from Apostrophic Labs in the free-departments.
